short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Revolutionize the StackOverflow UI to make it more visually appealing and accessible.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension acts as a skin for StackOverflow to make it more visually appealing and nicer to look at. It helps the overall design and makes the site easier to view.
